author: Brandie Weikle
title: The world could face a 2nd wave of COVID-19: Here's what Canada needs to do now to prepare
description: Countries must prepare for a second wave of the COVID-19 outbreak to emerge once social distancing measures are eased, and they should only lift those measures gradually, infectious disease experts say. Here's what you need to know about a potential second wa…
content:
Countries including Canada must prepare for a second wave of the COVID-19 outbreak to emerge once social distancing measures are eased, and they should only lift those measures gradually, infectious disease experts say.
A second wave of an outbreak is an inc… [+5863 chars]
